attributes.action: not let computer mice be extinct within 5 years! Save computer mice!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who doesn't want computer mice to be gone in the next 5 years?

Who thinks it is going to be more hard with using touch screens?


Go ahead and sign this! This is your chance to not let computer
mice be extinct!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
